entry.title: Welcome to my little corner
entry.content:
Hey! Welcome to my little corner of the Internet. I’m glad you can stop by :)

So, I’m getting older and I can’t remember half the stuff I’d like to do nowadays. This is a place where I can put my ideas, small projects, big projects and everything inbetween so when I want to I can actually find something back about them.

There are a few things that you should know up-front:

  1. Most of my projects have little to no documentation. Sorry, it’s just me and I hope to fix this eventually, but tiiiiiiiime.
  2. Pretty much everything on here is something I am doing/did for fun. Feel free to use whatever, whenever and if you have any questions or comments I’ll try to help as best I can.
  3. I have a loving, smart, sexy wife and a smart, super adorable baby girl. Ok, you don’t need to know this, but I like to brag about them :).
  4. I like making lists.
